thread.section_title: Rover.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Rover.com | rover.com
thread.title: Danielle

author: Danielle
title: Danielle
text:
I have been so thrilled with the service I've received from Rover.com!
As both a dog sitter for the site and a consumer of the services for my own dog, I see both sides of Rover.com, and each side is top-notch! The continual updates from sitters, the technical support for sitters and the trust built between clients is phenomenal. I'd recommend Rover.com to anyone looking for a safe and loving home for their pet. :)
